name: Tiny Tony's Pizza Rush
description:
Tiny Tony is a 5-year-old kid trying to make it big in the pizza boy world. By joining his family's pizza joint. The game takes place on a building that never seems to end. on the busiest hour of the day. Which is pizza rush hour. You must try to deliver all the pizzas to the customers.


The game was made by

N0thingsleft / Ezra Manchuk

under 6 hours

on-stream on Twitch.tv/N0thingsleft

join the discord server to show off your scores: https://discord.gg/VTKvserRnm
